*Solution?* Highly Autonomous Systems of Horticulture (**$HASH**) : Utilizing smart contracts to automate and democratize production, supply chain, and governance in the cannabis & psychedelic industry.

Creating community-ownership of the vertically-integrated $HASH Supply Chain of production, processing, distributing, and operating on-chain craft cannabis  compliance geared toward Web3 adoption. Information, data security, and their applications are essential for business optimization and transparency. Although there are many ERP solutions for the industry already, our governance will be centered around cannabis supply chain and DeFi dApps that utilize NFT-based SKUâ€™s to generate active product data and create on-chain interactions that comply with ESG metrics, paving the way for global regulations and the future of the cannabis space.

Developing Horticulture Public Goods : BIPOC Horticulture Initiative, Open-Source Library of Genetics, Strains and Phenos, Regenerative Farming Methods & Techniques, Cannabis Production, Processing, Entheogenic Cultivation, Medicinal Protocols, and a Community-Practitioner Directory

Community-Governance over the liquidity, yield-farming, and major-user decisions in the tokenization of HASH DAO. 

**DERO Data Privacy** **+ Tokenization of Security**

HASH DAO Governance is the future of the industry standard, and to do this we will start by partnering with one successful Emerald Triangle, Northern California craft cannabis-brand with community-staking of its future scaling of operations and expanding a compilation of automation protocols through smart contracts.

**Worldâ€™s First Cannabis DAO Founded On**:

BIPOC-equity and engineered around community-development governed by craft cannabis operators, backed by IRL projects.

**On-Chain Protocols + Smart Contracts = The Automated Horticulture of Tomorrow**

Creating a future:

* Geared to the love and cultivation of the plant and Mother Earth
* Onboarding BIPOC leaders and creatives onto the blockchain
* Compensating intellectual property proportionally to fulfill smart contracts

Reinvention of the Horticulture Supply Chain and Data Distribution via smart contracts that allow for automation and help individuals to create ownership over community-led projects, intellectual property, digital assets, and dApps.

**First Wins for HASH DAO**

> â€œCommunity Ownership of Physical and Digital Assetsâ€

Minting a multi-tiered HASH DAO NFT with the top governance tier going for $10 K, raising a total of $11.5 M for an initial $HASH treasury. As funds become available, proceeds will immediately go to partnering with South Face Mangement to purchase over 30 acres in Mendocino and 40+ acres Humbolt County. This will include the scaling of a vertically-integrated nursery, farm, hash processing, and soon-to-launch retail of award-winning legacy products under Uncle Macâ€™s brand and South Face Farms Management.

**Project #1 :**  Carry out renovation on the farm and nursery to ensure full-scale ESG-metric compliance and how to bring all aspects of the farm and itâ€™s production on-chain, from SKU NFTâ€™s to utilizing energy consumption data for carbon credit checks. Partnering with Uncle Macâ€™s, a Northern California craft cannabis brand, & South Face Management, parent company to Flower Wheel Nursery, South Face Farms Cultivation, and Uncle Macâ€™s brand.

**Project #2 :** Onboard visual and 3D artists who will design branding and assets for the Metaverse and we develop cross-chain NFTâ€™s to be dropped on various play-to-earn games. We will also be acquiring digital plots of real estate to build â€œMetaverse farmsâ€ and â€œdigital dispensariesâ€ where a user can view the product, find out all of itâ€™s information, and have it eventually delivered through an on-chain transaction. Along with digital land we will also be investing in domain names, including various strain names, cannabis celebrities, and psychedelic culture. Explore liquidity pools and yield farming with assets and treasury.

**Project #3 :** For the third project, weâ€™ll be launching Uncle Mac's HASH House is an Emerald Triangle legacy project. This on-chain Hash House is the home lab for Uncle Macâ€™s production. We will also operate as a wholesale fresh frozen supply chain solution for transportation, storage, distribution and hash toll processing throughout the greater Emerald Triangle area.

**Project #4** : Getting $HASH in your hands. This is our farm-to-table craft cannabis buyers club providing direct-to-consumer access to exclusive SKUâ€™s from legacy brands in the Emerald Triangle. This will include obtaining a retail and event license to launch Nephewâ€™s Automated.

**Project #5 :** Aggregating a library of horticulture public goods & building the Biodiversity BIPOC Glamping Learning Initiative; start building Marijuana for Minorities ProgramÂ to co-create $HASH University creating content with some of the best small-batch growers and washers in the industry. (Community Online Education)

**Project #6 :** Nephewâ€™s will be applying for its event space license building the foundation for Akasha, an immersive psychedelic A/R Lounge for BIPOC community healing. The distribution and delivery will be a warehouse that will have an on-chain ESG-metric system in the back and a public access immersive art space in the front. We will also be looking into developing a portfolio of boutique cannabis bud and breakfasts in emerging global cannabis markets.

**Project #7 :** We will be finding ERP solutions to develop state-of-the-art horticulture automation and Web3 technologies, based upon on-chain governance and compliance, to pave the way for the international industry standard by working towards meeting ESG-metric compliance. Our final goal is developing complete automation systems without compromising craft horticulture. From driverless deliveries, farm drone surveillance & data collection to utilize machine-learning and AI and to understand buyer behavior, horticulture improvements, growth optimization, etc.

title: HASH DAO ($HASH) Whitepaper
body:
*Updated : May 2022*

**Mission : Our mission is to cultivate Web3 community horticulture for the future of the cannabis space.** 

HASH DAO provides the first unified DAO solution forÂ craft cannabis farmers, industry professionals, investors, and BIPOCÂ communitiesÂ interested in theÂ cannabis space.

HASHÂ DAO has been created to allow integration into the emerging technologies of the blockchain and Web3 into the cannabis space. Focusing on farmers who put the plant first and under represented communities. To do this, we start by partnering with Uncle Mac's brand to create the worldâ€™s first Web3 Cannabis brand and community tooling of horticulture. Building a growing compilation of automation protocols using smart contracts, HASH DAOÂ Governance seeks to be the future industry standard.

**Problem**  

A successful craft cannabis brand with artisanal integrity struggles to navigate the extractive nature of the traditional corporate company structure. Typically the capital solutions available often compromise the integrity and quality of the products at the expense of the small brands reputation, consumers, and the Earth. 

***Solution***

Merging Web3 technologies with the cannabis space and creating a decentralized and democratized opportunities for companies to raise capital.

> **Opportunity**

The multi-billion dollar cannabis industry is entering itâ€™s boom phase as more global cannabis markets arise and support for [U.S. federal legalization](https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/3617) continues to grow support, in 2020 alone the cannabis space grew to over [$200 Billion](https://www.marketwatch.com/story/cannabis-sector-could-grow-to-200-billion-in-a-decade-say-stifel-analysts-2019-07-02) and is projected to 10x in the next decade.

Malpractice and gatekeeping of the cannabis industry has traditionally maximized profits at the cost of the plant or people, and in turn have provided barriers to entry to craft cannabis farmers and the BIPOC community.

> **Barriers of Entry + (Profit > People) = Current State of the Cannabis Space**

Corporate cannabis companies operate and control the majority of the space, leaving legacy operators and small brands without capital solutions to scale their businesses and do not take into consideration all of itâ€™s stakeholders :

* The Growers & Phenotype Hunters
* Cannabis Processing & Technology
* Dispensaries & Deliveries
* Consumers & Community
* Mother Earth

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/oXXVXLuIXOQoXtXRqzBXV.png?height=621&width=904)

The majority of the craft cannabis space, lacks in metrics and does not reward innovation or intellectual property; often operating at the cost of the patient, plant and the planet.

Cancerous pesticides, mold, and in-organic genetically modified flowers have all been out-dated practices utilized in current cannabis horticulture. This is largely due to a profit-driven model of the medicinal plant which has unjustly fined small legacy growers. Incarceration of marginalized communities for alternative medicine use at a disproportionate rate has since gate-kept entry into the space.

Farming, hash-processing, and cannabis tech are often driven to innovation by financial corporate investors, many times leaving most of the developers, designers, and legacy growers at the short end of the intellectual property stick. Elite genetics are identified by farmers through years of R/D sorting through phenotypes of each strain. Many times big brands exploit years of hard work and value that passionate master growers put in and often donâ€™t receive proper credit. Certain strains go on to become cultural identities that generate massive value, I.E. the creators and farmers innovate and the investors profit off their intellectual property, currently there is no on-chain authentication process.

Although track-and-trace is currently implemented, most cannabis brands are not completely transparent with their grow methods and techniques of production. There is also massive risk for current cannabis businesses as they have become targets for robberies the past few years. Legal brands are facing counterfeits and knock-offs in the black market. With the integration of digital identities, NFTs/Web3 purchasing, and automation, many of these problems are easily solved.

**HIGHLIGHT FRESH FROZEN PROBLEM**

![Exclusive Libraries of Genetics & Phenos](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/-8T4OrLTcNOJxW2vLerl-.jpg?height=1866&width=1536)

*Solution?* Highly Autonomous Systems of Horticulture (**$HASH**) : Utilizing smart contracts to automate and democratize production, supply chain, and governance in the cannabis & psychedelic industry.

Creating community-ownership of the vertically-integrated $HASH Supply Chain of production, processing, distributing, and operating on-chain craft cannabis  compliance geared toward Web3 adoption. Information, data security, and their applications are essential for business optimization and transparency. Although there are many ERP solutions for the industry already, our governance will be centered around cannabis supply chain and DeFi dApps that utilize NFT-based SKUâ€™s to generate active product data and create on-chain interactions that comply with ESG metrics, paving the way for global regulations and the future of the cannabis space.

Developing Horticulture Public Goods : BIPOC Horticulture Initiative, Open-Source Library of Genetics, Strains and Phenos, Regenerative Farming Methods & Techniques, Cannabis Production, Processing, Entheogenic Cultivation, Medicinal Protocols, and a Community-Practitioner Directory

Community-Governance over the liquidity, yield-farming, and major-user decisions in the tokenization of HASH DAO. 

**DERO Data Privacy** **+ Tokenization of Security**

HASH DAO Governance is the future of the industry standard, and to do this we will start by partnering with one successful Emerald Triangle, Northern California craft cannabis-brand with community-staking of its future scaling of operations and expanding a compilation of automation protocols through smart contracts.

**ON-CHAIN SUPPLY NFTs + ACTIVE INVENTORY TRACKING + CRYPTO TRANSACTIONS = Web3 Point of Sale (PoS)**

**Worldâ€™s First Cannabis DAO Founded On**:

BIPOC-equity and engineered around community-development governed by craft cannabis operators, backed by IRL projects.

**On-Chain Protocols + Smart Contracts = The Automated Horticulture of Tomorrow**

Creating a future:

* Geared to the love and cultivation of the plant and Mother Earth
* Onboarding BIPOC leaders and creatives onto the blockchain
* Compensating intellectual property proportionally to fulfill smart contracts

> **HASH DAO = Power Back in Your Hands**

Reinvention of the Horticulture Supply Chain and Data Distribution via smart contracts that allow for automation and help individuals to create ownership over community-led projects, intellectual property, digital assets, and dApps.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/M6C2p0sNHx37p783TEv9D.jpg?height=822&width=1125)

**First Wins for HASH DAO**

> â€œCommunity Ownership of Physical and Digital Assetsâ€

Minting a multi-tiered HASH DAO NFT with the top governance tier going for $10 K, raising a total of $11.5 M for an initial $HASH treasury. As funds become available, proceeds will immediately go to partnering with South Face Mangement to purchase over 30 acres in Mendocino and 40+ acres Humbolt County. This will include the scaling of a vertically-integrated nursery, farm, hash processing, and soon-to-launch retail of award-winning legacy products under Uncle Macâ€™s brand and South Face Farms Management.

**Project #1 :**  Carry out renovation on the farm and nursery to ensure full-scale ESG-metric compliance and how to bring all aspects of the farm and itâ€™s production on-chain, from SKU NFTâ€™s to utilizing energy consumption data for carbon credit checks. Partnering with Uncle Macâ€™s, a Northern California craft cannabis brand, & South Face Management, parent company to Flower Wheel Nursery, South Face Farms Cultivation, and Uncle Macâ€™s brand.

**Project #2 :** Onboard visual and 3D artists who will design branding and assets for the Metaverse and we develop cross-chain NFTâ€™s to be dropped on various play-to-earn games. We will also be acquiring digital plots of real estate to build â€œMetaverse farmsâ€ and â€œdigital dispensariesâ€ where a user can view the product, find out all of itâ€™s information, and have it eventually delivered through an on-chain transaction. Along with digital land we will also be investing in domain names, including various strain names, cannabis celebrities, and psychedelic culture. Explore liquidity pools and yield farming with assets and treasury.

**Project #3 :** For the third project, weâ€™ll be launching Uncle Mac's HASH House is an Emerald Triangle legacy project. This on-chain Hash House is the home lab for Uncle Macâ€™s production. We will also operate as a wholesale fresh frozen supply chain solution for transportation, storage, distribution and hash toll processing throughout the greater Emerald Triangle area.

**Project #4** : Getting $HASH in your hands. This is our farm-to-table craft cannabis buyers club providing direct-to-consumer access to exclusive SKUâ€™s from legacy brands in the Emerald Triangle. This will include obtaining a retail and event license to launch Nephewâ€™s Automated.

**Project #5 :** Aggregating a library of horticulture public goods & building the Biodiversity BIPOC Glamping Learning Initiative; start building Marijuana for Minorities ProgramÂ to co-create $HASH University creating content with some of the best small-batch growers and washers in the industry. (Community Online Education)

**Project #6 :** Nephewâ€™s will be applying for its event space license building the foundation for Akasha, an immersive psychedelic A/R Lounge for BIPOC community healing. The distribution and delivery will be a warehouse that will have an on-chain ESG-metric system in the back and a public access immersive art space in the front. We will also be looking into developing a portfolio of boutique cannabis bud and breakfasts in emerging global cannabis markets.

**Project #7 :** We will be finding ERP solutions to develop state-of-the-art horticulture automation and Web3 technologies, based upon on-chain governance and compliance, to pave the way for the international industry standard by working towards meeting ESG-metric compliance. Our final goal is developing complete automation systems without compromising craft horticulture. From driverless deliveries, farm drone surveillance & data collection to utilize machine-learning and AI and to understand buyer behavior, horticulture improvements, growth optimization, etc.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/QcqQLT4DyBHuQRaaputgr.png?height=560&width=997)
